page.title: 04SEALE HAYNE COLLEGE (CONTD).
page.content: women is about 3:1,many courses having equal numbers.Some residential places are offered at the college,but many students live in the local area,often occupying "holiday homes" during offseason times.Agriculture in Britain is now very technical and highly organised.It is also closely linked to the European Economic Community and the college's courses reflect this.In the degree course,students cover such subjects as engineering,management accounting,genetics,animal biology,and communication studies.The Higher National Diploma Rural Studies course unique to{Seale Hayne,}gives students an understanding of the conflicting demands of land users(farmers builders water boards,conservationists etc.)The college also offers courses in applied biology and food technology.Research at the college is problem orientated
